thread.title: Earthquake hits Himachal Pradesh

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Earthquake hits Himachal Pradesh
text:
Comments 
Shimla, Oct 8: Himachal Pradeshâ€™s Mandi district was rocked by a low-intensity earthquake on Thursday morning, an official said. However, there was no loss of life. (Also Read: Earthquake in India: Low intensity quake hits Mandi in Himachal Pradesh) 
Tremors of the magnitude 3.8 earthquake were felt for some seconds in several parts of Mandi and nearby districts at 6.34 a.m., Meteorological Office Director Manmohan Singh told IANS. 
The epicentre of the quake was in the Sundernagar area. This is the second time in this year that Himachal Pradesh was hitted by earthquake.Earlier on August 19 this year a low intensity earthquake measuring 4 on the Richter scale hit Mandi district of Himachal Pradesh state on . According to the Meteorological department, the earthquake hit the region at around 12:48 AM. (Image is used for representation purpose only)
